name: master-of-puppets
description: This module is a Spring-like container that implements the inversion-of-control pattern. (not generalized yet, just for SK ECOTrol project so far)

scripts.copy: cp package.json dist/ && cp README.md dist/ && cp LICENSE dist/
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run copy
